title: The Boys Are Back From IPCPR & Steve Saka Joins Us!
itunes:title: The Boys Are Back From IPCPR & Steve Saka Joins Us!
description:
The boys are back and we will discuss IPCPR with Steve Saka from Dunbarton Tobacco & Trust as we light up his Mi Querida in the first hour of the show. This show has the potential of creating the perfect storm as Steve isn't shy and promises to unload his thoughts about the most recent IPCPR.

In the second hour we will light up the new Winston Churchill Late Hour from Davidoff Cigars as we discuss all the chatter heard at the trade show, who appeared to be hot, and who was not.

Barry gives us the latest cigar news and step into the Asylum which promises to push the envelope, while Mr. Jonathan tells us how to be Debonaire as David Garafolo tries to keep things under control in a show that just might ruffle a few feathers.

Join live from Two Guys Smoke Shop in Salem, NH and as always you can find many of the cigars we discuss at http://www.2GuysCigars.com/
